results.abstract: press briefed on progress of Project Mercury and training of 7 astronauts, Langley Field, Va; project being directed by NASA Space Task Group under R R Gilruth; tests undergone by astronauts, tech problems of capsule and launching vehicle discussed; 1st manned launching seen 2 yrs off; weightlessness tests illus

headline.main: Astronauts Preview Space Trip; But Putting a Man Into an Orbit Is Still Two Years Away

results.snippet: LANGLEY FIELD, Va., July 8 -- The seven Mercury Astronauts have lived on a space diet, gone skin-diving in the ocean deeps and tumbled free of the earth's gravitational pull in preparation for the first human flight into outer space.
results.lead_paragraph: LANGLEY FIELD, Va., July 8 -- The seven Mercury Astronauts have lived on a space diet, gone skin-diving in the ocean deeps and tumbled free of the earth's gravitational pull in preparation for the first human flight into outer space.

results.abstract: HR com to study reptd sag in morale among astronauts because of loss of flying time and pay
results.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 9 (AP) -- The House Select Committee on Astronautics and Space Exploration ordered an inquiry today into reports of sagging morale among the Mercury Astronauts, the men chosen for this country's first manned space flight.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 9 (AP) -- The House Select Committee on Astronautics and Space Exploration ordered an inquiry today into reports of sagging morale among the Mercury Astronauts, the men chosen for this country's first manned space flight.

results.abstract: Moscow radio repts Otvazhnaya survived 4th successful flight July 10 with another dog in single-stags missile with payload of 4,840 lbs; says scientific mission was same as July 2 shot; alt not revealed, 2d dog not named

headline.main: SOVIET SPACE DOG SURVIVES 4TH TRIP; Recovered With Companion and Rocket Instruments SOVIET SPACE DOG SAFE ON 4TH TRIP

results.snippet: MOSCOW, July 13 -- The world's most traveled space dog has made another rocket flight into the upper atmosphere and returned safely to the Soviet Union.

byline.original: By OSGOOD CARUTHERSSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, July 13 -- The world's most traveled space dog has made another rocket flight into the upper atmosphere and returned safely to the Soviet Union.

results.abstract: to wear pressure suits and ventilated underwear costing $3,750
results.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 23 (UPI) -- The Mercury astronauts will wear $3,750 outfits consisting of a pressure suit made for the Navy and air-conditioned underwear made for the Air Force.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 23 (UPI) -- The Mercury astronauts will wear $3,750 outfits consisting of a pressure suit made for the Navy and air-conditioned underwear made for the Air Force.
